title: Re: My avatar
content: It should be possible to edit it in Edit Profile.. Paste the image URL to the "My Photo" box, and make sure you haven't toggled the "private" box..Eat your veggies!

title: Re: My avatar
content:
Where's it hosted? Some places (Geocities, for example) don't allow the displaying of images outside of their domain (... or something like that).--------------

title: Re: My avatar
content:
Ah... I had this problem to; you must make sure the check box just over it is not set to keeping your avatar private.

That usually works...
